title: UPDATE 3-Super Rugby summaries
text: March 17, 2018 / 11:25 AM / Updated 3 hours ago UPDATE 3-Super Rugby summaries Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Mar 17 (OPTA) - summaries from the Super Rugby matches on Saturday Highlanders (14) 25 Tries: Coltman (9), Sopoaga (14), Dixon (49) Conversions: Sopoaga (10,14) Penalties: Sopoaga (65,69) Yellow cards: Naholo (41) Crusaders (10) 17 Tries: Bridge (5), Hall (54) Conversions: Hunt (7,55) Penalties: Hunt (19) Referee: Nick Briant Brumbies (10) 24 Tries: Taliauli (17), Speight (46) Conversions: Hawera (18) Penalties: Hawera (6,61,64,71) Yellow cards: McCaffrey (35), Alaalatoa (52) Sharks (3) 17 Tries: du Toit (56), Bosch (76) Conversions: du Preez (57,77) Penalties: du Preez (30) Referee: Glen Jackson Stormers (13:05) Blues Ground: DHL Newlands Lions (15:15) Sunwolves Ground: Emirates Airlines Park Jaguares (21:40) Reds Ground: Estadio Jose Amalfitani Sunday, March 18 fixtures (GMT) Waratahs v Rebels (05:05)
